name: Warlords HD:Call To Arms
description:
The summer fun pack is included free for a limited time!! Get your friends playing vs mode with you while it lasts!

Warlords HD presents the intense action of the original in stunning high quality graphics and larger battlefields! Now featured in Hot New Games! Thanks Apple! Multiplayer update is comming to iPhone and then iPad shortly after!
______________________________________
"Everything about Warlords: Call to Arms represents top notch game play, and is one of the best quality strategy games I’ve seen for the iPhone/iTouch platform."
-Tony M. iphoneappreviews.net

"This is one of the best strategy iPhone apps on the market today."
-bestapps.me

"It's kind of like Plants vs Zombies, except that your plants move--and look like Warcraft characters. Relentless, addicting fun."
-cnet.com
___________________
Do you dream of leading legions of orcs, elves, humans and trolls into battle? Bring your dreams to life on your phone with Warlords: Call To Arms. Experience the insanely addicting game-play that is based on the hugely popular flash game. See what 10s of millions of gamers are raving about!

Features include:
-High rez unit and battlefield graphics
-Larger battlefields mean more troops!
-Control one of 8 races including elves, orcs, trolls, undead and humans
-Choose from 19 different units including archers, swordsman, mages and the ferocious Giant Troll
-Conquer the 28 countries that make up the campaign map
-Choose from 4 difficulty levels
-Visit the shop to purchase upgrades or add new units to your army
-Open Feint integration includes a bundle of achievements to unlock
-Watch the detailed animations as giant armies hack and slash it out on the battlefield
-Hear the battlefield come to life with the clang of swords smashing and arrows flying

Your armies await you and your rivals approach from all sides. Seize the throne!
